mechanisms.title: Involute Spur Gear Pair
mechanisms.summary: Matched spur gear pair with parametric module, pressure angle and backlash.
mechanisms.prompt_block: Generate a meshing involute spur gear pair from shared module and pressure angle. Keep tooth counts, bore diameters, face width, and backlash offset as named parameters. Verify center distance from pitch radii.

mechanisms.title: Helical Gear Pair
mechanisms.summary: Helical pair with mirrored helix angle and axial alignment.
mechanisms.prompt_block: Build a helical gear pair with opposite helix directions for proper meshing. Parameterize helix angle, module, tooth counts, and face width. Keep backlash and center distance explicit.

mechanisms.title: Herringbone Gear Pair
mechanisms.summary: Double-helical gears to reduce axial thrust.
mechanisms.prompt_block: Create herringbone gears by combining mirrored helical halves. Keep split-plane, half-width, and helix angle parametric. Maintain mesh compatibility and center distance constraints.

mechanisms.title: Internal Ring Gear Mesh
mechanisms.summary: Internal ring gear and mating pinion geometry.
mechanisms.prompt_block: Model an internal ring gear with mating external pinion. Parameterize rim width, tooth counts, module, and radial clearance. Ensure interference-free rotation envelope.

mechanisms.title: Planetary Gearset Layout
mechanisms.summary: Sun-planet-ring gearset with configurable number of planets.
mechanisms.prompt_block: Generate a planetary set using consistent module and tooth relationships. Parameterize sun/planet tooth counts and planet count. Keep carrier bolt-circle and clearances adjustable.

mechanisms.title: Bevel Gear Pair
mechanisms.summary: Conical gear pair for intersecting axes.
mechanisms.prompt_block: Create a bevel gear pair for specified shaft angle. Parameterize module, tooth counts, cone angle, and face width. Keep cone apex alignment and backlash explicit.

mechanisms.title: Gear and Rack Interface
mechanisms.summary: Pinion and linear rack conversion mechanism.
mechanisms.prompt_block: Build a pinion-rack set from shared module and pressure angle. Parameterize rack length, tooth count, and mounting offset. Include backlash control and engagement depth.

mechanisms.title: Ring-Planet Clearance Shell
mechanisms.summary: Clearance envelope for ring and planet carrier motion.
mechanisms.prompt_block: Generate clearance envelopes around rotating planet gears inside ring gear. Parameterize radial and axial clearances and report collision-safe shell thickness for housing integration.
